sub_title: Sales Professional with 30 years (including 20 years in Europe) experience of winning large deals for Digital and Engineering R&D offerings to customers globally
summary:
Prasad is a senior sales professional with 30 years of experience, including over 26 years at the TATA Group at TATA Consultancy Services (TCS). He also has over a decade of experience of board level governance having worked as both Executive and Independent Non-Executive Board Member of different European boards. 

His sales experience spans across the globe in all continents offering Digital, Engineering, Sourcing and Manufacturing solutions to the customers across industries. His unique value proposition is driving business growth with profit margins, building trusted long-term relationships at the strategic level and delivering highest quality customer experience along with strong commitment to Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) values. 
 
He is a Chartered Engineer with degree in Chemical engineering from UDCT (Institute of Chemical Engineering) with MBA from WeSchool, Mumbai University and holds Diploma in Corporate Governance from the Corporate Governance Institute. In addition, he did courses on sustainability from Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University.

An avid Yoga practitioner, he started an initiative for personal wellness transformation using Yoga techniques for busy executives. He also won MyLifeMyYoga Contest 2020 (Italian Chapter) organised by the Government of India.

He is an Indian citizen living in Europe with his family for the last 20 years.
